LuffyMod:MyRelic.NAME: Straw Hat
LuffyMod:MyRelic.FLAVOR: My treasure? If you want it, I'll let you have it. Go find it! I left everything this world has to offer there!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain an additional random relic each time you defeat an Elite or Boss.

LuffyMod:GumGumFruitRelic.NAME: Gum-Gum Fruit?
LuffyMod:GumGumFruitRelic.FLAVOR: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that turns the eater into a Rubber Human.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain the power of the Gum-Gum Fruit.

LuffyMod:GoingMerry.NAME: Going Merry
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 12 Block. Durability decreases by 1 each time you enter a room.
The Going Merry can no longer be used.
